scripts.deploy: cat template_params.txt | xargs aws cloudformation deploy --template-file ./template_packaged.yml --capabilities CAPABILITY_IAM
scripts.deploy:info: head -1 template_params.txt | xargs aws cloudformation describe-stacks
scripts.dev:upload-stock-csv: aws s3 cp ./fixtures/stock.csv s3://$(npm run deploy:info | grep "StockBucketName" -A1 | tail -n 1 | cut -d \" -f4)/$(date +%s).csv
